Is there a way to make a single command that starts asciinema, points to the file and starts a stream in one go?
each new line in the cast is a new 'event' so liveterm is just watching that file for new lines and sending that to the webpage via socket io
the whole reason this is somewhat feasible for me to do is cause of their v2 file format

so... once you get everything downloaded and set up, you:
• start a regular asciinema recording
• point liveterm to that file
• run liveterm
• profit
